name: Latig0sx
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
body:
### Use

**1) Check your System Configuration**

    $ sudo ./latigo-check -u <user>

**2) System Hardening**

    $ sudo ./latigo-hardening -u <user>

### Download

[latig0sx-0.2.tar.gz](https://github.com/downloads/zxlain/latig0sx/latig0sx-0.2.tar.gz)

### Features

    Check System Hardware
    Check Global System Settings
    Check System Preferences
    Check Accounts
    Check Network Services
    System Hardening

### Screenshots

![Check](http://sourceforge.net/projects/latig0sx/screenshots/latigo-check.png)
![Hardening](http://sourceforge.net/projects/latig0sx/screenshots/latigo-hardening.png)

Compliance with the common NSA criteria
